Relatively fast download. Got the game in under an hour. Bad judging from the File size, but still, I got the game. A lost classic. It's a great game and this torrent works perfectly. Just run the unpacker, who'll run the setup, who'll unpack the game, and you're done. Works great.

where is the runblack.exe?  if you click install a blue screen come up with some weird music. if you click .nfo it'll give you the directions on how to install black and white, but i am stuck on the last step. any help?
well i am stuck on step 2, i cant find the setup.bat I am really excited to play this game pleasee help!

What I did:

1. Unrar "black and white.exe"
2. Unrar "black.ace"
3. Run "setup.bat" It will go through this black screen and then this other thing pops up talking about injecting files. Let it completely finish, or game wont run.
4. I clicked "setup.exe" but that just bring up the graphic settings.
5. "runblack.exe" to run the game.

Game works for me. Only problem I get though is a graphics one. parts of the screen become all glitchy and change colors rapidly. Other people refer to it as "triangles of color." Hoping to find a solution, if I do, I'll post again.
Also, my computer should be able to run this. I can play fable(from the same company) and command and conquer 3 tiberium wars on it. I am, however, running on windows xp. This could be the problem...

Ok, so apparently there are people out there running it on xp. To fix the graphics problem, you can try this http://www.gamefaqs.com/boards/914356-black-and-white/45102710 .

But it didn't work for me :/ Still have the glitchy triangles of color...
